entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
